wiki.content:
"All My Life" is a song by the American hard rock band Foo Fighters, released as the first single from their fourth album, One by One. The song won a Grammy Award for best hard rock performance, and spent ten straight weeks at #1 on the Hot Modern Rock Tracks chart, coincidentally succeeding Nirvana and their previously unreleased final recording, "You Know You're Right". Dave Grohl notes that the band had wanted a heavier sounding song to appear as a single, stating that the band were "coming out with "Learn to Fly" and "Next Year" and other songs that had middle-of-the-road melodies."
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "All My Life" is a song by the American hard rock band Foo Fighters, released as the first single from their fourth album, One by One. The song won a Grammy Award for best hard rock performance, and spent ten straight weeks at #1 on the Hot Modern Rock Tracks chart, coincidentally succeeding Nirvana and their previously unreleased final recording, "You Know You're Right". Dave Grohl notes that the band had wanted a heavier sounding song to appear as a single, stating that the band were "coming out with "Learn to Fly" and "Next Year" and other songs that had middle-of-the-road melodies.

track.name: All My Life
comments: It seems like all Foo Fighters songs on last.fm are live. I hate live music UNLESS I AM ACTUALLY THERE. Don't play a recording of a live song!
All my life I've been searching for something.... God i fucking love the beginning of this song!

Part of my "woe is me" playlist on Facebook.
Consider joining these groups: OVER THE PRETENCE and I'm British, but I have this thing for American music...
Love this song forever... and ever, haha!
Pimps and female pimps unite! Foo Fighters \m/!
First time I heard this was on some MTV award show & they played it live. That drummer, that drummer, that drummer! If I had a _____ I would've had a _____!
